snippet: The Americans accuse Afghan officials of impeding an investigation into a possible smuggling ring that may have involved an officer who shot eight American service members last year.
abstract: American officials say Afghan defense officials are impeding an investigation into accusations that members of their air force are smuggling opium and weapons and that an Afghan officer who shot and killed eight American service members last year may have been involved in the suspected trafficking; investigators have been given limited access to Afghan military personnel who could provide needed evidence, but they have been kept away from parts of the airport where they suspect smuggling may still be taking place.
lead_paragraph: The Americans accuse Afghan officials of impeding an investigation into a possible smuggling ring that may have involved an officer who shot eight American service members last year.

headline.seo: Afghans Are Hindering Smuggling Inquiry, 2 Americans Say
headline.main: Officials Hinder Inquiry Into Afghan Air Force on Smuggling, Two Americans Say
headline.print_headline: Officials Hinder Inquiry Into Afghan Air Force on Smuggling, Two Americans Say
